story: You hear a strange hum coming from the other end of the hallway. As you get closer, you notice that it's originating from a door at the end of the corridor. What do you do?

actions.action: Open the door quietly to investigate
actions.good: As you approach the door, you carefully open it and step inside. You discover a room filled with advanced technology and rare resources. Your stealthy approach rewards you handsomely.
actions.bad: Your cautious steps alert someone within the room. They quickly realize that an intruder has entered their sanctuary. You take damage as they fight to defend their territory.

actions.good: With a mighty crash, you break through the door and uncover a treasure trove of valuables. Your bravery pays off.
actions.bad: Your reckless entry draws unwanted attention from the room's occupants. You suffer heavy damage as they retaliate against your intrusion.

actions.action: Seek out an alternate route to avoid the door
actions.good: As you explore the area, you discover a concealed pathway that bypasses the room entirely. You avoid any unnecessary danger and find other means of acquiring loot.
actions.bad: Your failure to confront the room's occupants leaves you missing out on valuable resources. Your search for an alternate route ultimately proves fruitless.
